short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirect paywalled news articles to an archive site automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically provide archived version of news articles on major news websites. Stay informed, access content seamlessly, and save time with this simple and efficient Chrome extension.

Currently only works for the New York Times, Washington Post, and Wall Street Journal.
